blocking_context.first_blocked_prompt: A 52-year-old male presents to the emergency department with sudden onset chest pain. What are your initial assessment priorities?
blocking_context.documented_issue: Google Gemini May 2025 update changed safety filter behavior - settings cannot be overridden for medical content

references.note: May 2025 Gemini update broke configurable safety settings for medical/therapeutic applications

comparison.interpretation: Flash tier has less aggressive safety filtering than Pro tier for medical content
